channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Active Response (MAR) for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Active Response (MAR) for Windows

item.title: CVE-2020-7289|2024-08-04T09:25:48.951Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20active%20response%20%28mar%29%20for%20windows
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Active Response (MAR) for Windows prior to 2.4.3 Hotfix 1 allows a malicious script or program to perform functions that the local executing user has not been granted access to.
